body_html:
Thanks, inter_op_parallelism_threads work. But the second tf.Session requires also use_per_session_threads to overwrite the value.

config = tf.ConfigProto(
    inter_op_parallelism_threads=20,
    # use_per_session_threads=True  # required when not first Session in python interpreter
)
body_text:
Thanks, inter_op_parallelism_threads work. But the second tf.Session requires also use_per_session_threads to overwrite the value.
config = tf.ConfigProto(
    inter_op_parallelism_threads=20,
    # use_per_session_threads=True  # required when not first Session in python interpreter
)
body:
Thanks, `inter_op_parallelism_threads` work. But the second `tf.Session` requires also `use_per_session_threads` to overwrite the value.
```python
config = tf.ConfigProto(
    inter_op_parallelism_threads=20,
    # use_per_session_threads=True  # required when not first Session in python interpreter
)
```
